meta.description: Runs the front-end unit tests and fasta tests.
This configuration is used by the vm kbc builders.
This configuration is used to get fast feedback on vm builds.
This configuration is used by the vm precomp builders on Android.
This configuration is used for running FFI tests in JIT-mode on Android.
This configuration is used by the vm kernel precomp builders.
This configuration is used by the vm kernel precomp debug builders. It uses 15 shards for testing to avoid 1 hour shard timeouts.
This configuration is used by the vm kernel precomp builders using bare instructions.
This configuration is used by the obfuscated vm kernel precomp builders.
This configuration is used by the vm builders with address sanitizing (asan). We have to run gn.py with the DART_USE_ASAN options, which we do by running generate_buildfiles.
This configuration is for the kernel builder group.
This configuration is for the co19_2 kernel builder group.
This configuration is for the kernel builder group in checked mode.
This configuration is for the cross arm builders.
This configuration is used by the vm kernel app builder group.
This configuration is used by the ddc builder group.
This configuration is used by the ddc builder group.
This is the configuration for the kernel optcounter builders, under the vm-kernel group. They run the same tests as the ordinary VM kernel builders, but add extra options to the vm.
This is the configuration for the kernel hot reload builders.
This is the configuration for kernel reload rollback builders.
Runs the dart2js unit tests.
dart2js-d8 tests with assertions during compilation
dart2js-d8 tests with new-RTI enabled
dart2js browser tests for Dart 2.0.
dart2js tests for Dart 2.0.
dart2js tests in csp and minified mode.
This configuration is used by the linux sdk builder. The difference between this configuration and the other sdk builder configurations is that this one also generates the api docs.
This configuration is used by the sdk-builders for MacOS.
This configuration is used by the sdk-builders for Windows. It also adds CQ coverage for building on Windows.
This configuration is used by the debianpackage-builder.
This configuration is used by the versionchecker-builder.
This configuration is used by the analyzer builders.
Analyze analyzer related packages.
This configuration is used by the release pkg builders.
This configuration is used by the debug pkg builders.
Verify benchmarks build and run correctly.

steps.name: see this step for details on what this bot does
remove out directory to do a clean linux-ia32 build
remove out directory to do a clean linux-x64 build
remove out directory to do a clean linux-x64-bytecode build

meta.description: This configuration is used for analyzing flutter.
This configuration is used for running frontend tests on flutter code.
This configuration is used for fuzz testing.
This configuration runs tests for each supported ABI version.
